entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
